About Scout Digital Training

About Scout Digital Training: Scout Digital Marketing’s specialist training division

Scout Digital Training is dedicated to providing practical and effective digital training to small groups and individuals for a variety of industries.

Whether you’re seeking to advance your career, become a leader in your field, increase your online reach or meet your marketing objectives, these in person, courses and workshops will leave you feeling confident and filled with extra knowledge and skills.

Our educational sessions work with your existing knowledge to boost efficiency and ensure you get the absolute most out of the training and workshops.

We offer
  • genuine guidance and personalised advice
  • expertise on best practices and
  • technical knowledge and proven techniques.

With years of expertise in the digital marketing arena, our approach is friendly, professional, trustworthy and knowledgeable.

We’ll do our best. Scout’s honour.

About your trainers:

At Scout Digital Training, we pride ourselves on sourcing the best local practising experts on the topics we offer you in our popular workshops.

You’ll find each trainer experienced, knowledgeable and, best of all, friendly and enthusiastic.

Discover more about your trainers here.

The training venue

Our training sessions are held in modern meeting rooms which are conveniently located in the Adelaide CBD.

Please note: You will need to bring your own laptop.

Intersect
167 Flinders Street
Adelaide, South Australia

Car parking

Intersect is surrounded by parking options. Undercover car parks or public transport are recommended for the half day training courses.

The nearest carpark is: UPark on Pirie/Flinders.

Food and drinks

Coffee, tea, water, biscuits and fruit are provided during the training session.

Intersect is conveniently situated near a number of cafes, should you require them.
